extendedInfo.description: **TRY FOR FREE AND IF YOU LIKE IT, UNLOCK THE FULL VERSION**Epic journey through time, finally available for Android devices. "Close enough to Hyrule to make Zelda fans feel right at home" (www.appletell.com)Exclusive DX Features:â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â New Dungeon, New Boss++ more playtime, more fun!â Much Improved Battle System++ whole new gameplay experience!â Anime Cut-Scenesâ â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â â Press Reviews:RPGFan: "Across Age is a throwback to classic Action RPGs of the Super Nintendo and Genesis era... see how gorgeous the game looks"Touch Arcade: "A great combination of fun combat and good puzzle variation allows Across Age to swiftly avoid the problems that many RPGs run into"GamePro Magazine: "Across Age is unique and well-crafted, making it an easy contender for the title of "best action RPG on the App Store."Kotaku.com: "retro charm and intriguing time-travel puzzles"About:Across Age rekindles the golden 16-bit era.Travel back through time and experience an all new oldschool 2D Action RPG! âAcross Ageâ is the first Zelda like Action RPG to include real environmental puzzles, with the look of famous SNES and Genesis cartridge games. The game offers 15 hours of classic 2D Action RPG gameplay, exciting story, anime cutscenes, a sweeping soundtrack and tons of diversified locations, monsters and riddles. Step into the role of 2 switchable characters: swordsman Ales and magician Ceska, each with own fighting and special skills that are needed to solve tricky puzzles and successfully battle fierce monsters. This cooperative element is one of the key features of the game. Another key feature is the possibility to travel through time and revisit places, enabling exciting events and riddles.Find spike shoes to walk on ice, burn bushes to open new paths, find friends who help you on your journey.Let the adventure begin!

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Delightful old school rpg game. Lots of fun, well worth the $.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best Android RPG.
reviews.comment: The story line is brilliant. The graphics are good. The feel of the game is great. A must have for oldschool RPG fans.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: How much?
reviews.comment: Fun, but ITS A DEMO that ends in 5 minutes and it doesnt tell you how much it costs to unlock ANYWHERE. Thought about purchasing but since I cant find out how much until after buying, UNINSTALL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like the very first Final Fantasy game...
reviews.comment: This game is full of fun! As and oldschool gamer, this game reminds me of the very first Final Fantasy game that I played on my NES game system... Turn-based RPG with an entertaining story line.
reviews.author: Holly Creel

reviews.title: Scam On Credit Cards
reviews.comment: I bought this and was charged three time then had other charges added on when I only thought I was paying $4.99. DO NOT BUY!
reviews.author: Rachel M

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: It\'s too short even though its a demo. The game looks good, great gameplay that kinda reminds me of Zelda, but still far from it. It started out fine, but if this game was only available if purchased, then sorry I will not buy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed the storyline, and all the hidden puzzles. Great time killer. Would buy all over again if I had too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Price?
reviews.comment: I enjoyed it, brought me back to the old school days,  something I was really looking for.  But i dont want to buy it from an outside source or provide any of my info without knowing how much it\'s going to cost.  List the price and you\'ll probably get more users.
reviews.author: Emily King

reviews.title: Lousy.
reviews.comment: Lousy UI. Below average RPG game cant compare to Zelda. This is a trail version have to pay to play on. Not worth installing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: great action rpg. full game is $4 to unlock, no in-app purchases or bs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whuuut?
reviews.comment: I don\'t get the Zelda reference. This is nothing like Zelda. Just an average rpg. Good game for ages 6-10. Not worth the money for such a short game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Way too cool
reviews.comment: This game really satisfied me, everything you did with this is superb. Now would you mind accepting a humble request? Please create BOBBY CARROT games for Android! They are the best games ever.
reviews.author: Lance Corby

reviews.title: How much?
reviews.comment: Pay to get full version but no where does it say how much they are charging. Seems sketchy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: One of the best rpgs I have yet found on the android market. Real time always keeps me addicted and away from the bs of everday life. I would rate 10 out of 10 if the option was there. The game is different but I wouldn\'t have it any other way.           Redrumirish
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lags like a mofo on Nexus S
reviews.comment: Looks great, and seems fun but man it laaaags solo bad on my Nexus S, and NoThing ever lags on my Nexus S. If this can be fixed you deserve 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Oi
reviews.comment: Freezes after 5mins play!!! If you can stop it from freezing after 5minutes of play that would make it 5star, but as it is I have to force close it after 5minutes.. GalaxyS2 AND I PAID FOR FULL VERSION! FIX IT PLEASE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: My favorite 2d RPG on the market. I had no problems obtaining, installing, or, restoring the full version after purchase. Control pad needs work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Above Average Adventure
reviews.comment: The storyline slightly soft. And some of the enemies are a bit tame.  Fluid controls  and great Tecknique make it  A very Playable Adventure on Google Play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Free Trial was disappointing
reviews.comment: Could be a good game? but trial is weak. You will spend an hour tapping the next button on a uninteresting dialog and only about 5 minutes actually playing a game.  And then the game is over. I will not purchase.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: B S of a game
reviews.comment: The game is a 1000 percent worthless. I played chapter 1 and now 2 play the rest of the game u have 2 buy the game. The best thing 2 do with this game is delete it from market
reviews.author: Charles Willhite
